text.div:
Karyotypic Sex

Represents the chromosomal sex of an individual.

This code system http://ga4gh.org/fhir/phenopackets/CodeSystem/karyotypic-sex defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
UNKNOWN_KARYOTYPE Untyped or inconclusive karyotypingUntyped or inconclusive karyotyping
XX FemaleFemale
XY MaleMale
XO Single X chromosome onlySingle X chromosome only
XXY Two X and one Y chromosomeTwo X and one Y chromosome
XXX Three X chromosomesThree X chromosomes
XXYY Two X chromosomes and two Y chromosomesTwo X chromosomes and two Y chromosomes
XXXY Three X chromosomes and one Y chromosomeThree X chromosomes and one Y chromosome
XXXX Four X chromosomesFour X chromosomes
XYY One X and two Y chromosomesOne X and two Y chromosomes
OTHER_KARYOTYPE None of the above typesNone of the above types

name: KaryotypicSex
title: Karyotypic Sex
publisher: Global Alliance for Genomics and Health
description: Represents the chromosomal sex of an individual.

concept.display: Two X and one Y chromosome
concept.definition: Two X and one Y chromosome

concept.display: Two X chromosomes and two Y chromosomes
concept.definition: Two X chromosomes and two Y chromosomes

concept.display: Three X chromosomes and one Y chromosome
concept.definition: Three X chromosomes and one Y chromosome

concept.display: One X and two Y chromosomes
concept.definition: One X and two Y chromosomes
